Books.Author: Gambardella, Matthew
Books.Title: XML Developer's Guide
Books.Description:
An in-depth look at creating applications 
      with XML.

Books.Author: Ralls, Kim
Books.Title: Midnight Rain
Books.Description:
A former architect battles corporate zombies, 
      an evil sorceress, and her own childhood to become queen 
      of the world.

Books.Author: Corets, Eva
Books.Title: Maeve Ascendant
Books.Description:
After the collapse of a nanotechnology 
      society in England, the young survivors lay the 
      foundation for a new society.

Books.Author: Corets, Eva
Books.Title: Oberon's Legacy
Books.Description:
In post-apocalypse England, the mysterious 
      agent known only as Oberon helps to create a new life 
      for the inhabitants of London. Sequel to Maeve 
      Ascendant.

Books.Author: Corets, Eva
Books.Title: The Sundered Grail
Books.Description:
The two daughters of Maeve, half-sisters, 
      battle one another for control of England. Sequel to 
      Oberon's Legacy.

Books.Author: Randall, Cynthia
Books.Title: Lover Birds
Books.Description:
When Carla meets Paul at an ornithology 
      conference, tempers fly as feathers get ruffled.

Books.Author: Thurman, Paula
Books.Title: Splish Splash
Books.Description:
A deep sea diver finds true love twenty 
      thousand leagues beneath the sea.

Books.Author: Knorr, Stefan
Books.Title: Creepy Crawlies
Books.Description:
An anthology of horror stories about roaches,
      centipedes, scorpions  and other insects.

Books.Author: Kress, Peter
Books.Title: Paradox Lost
Books.Description:
After an inadvertant trip through a Heisenberg
      Uncertainty Device, James Salway discovers the problems 
      of being quantum.

Books.Author: O'Brien, Tim
Books.Title: Microsoft .NET: The Programming Bible
Books.Description:
Microsoft's .NET initiative is explored in 
      detail in this deep programmer's reference.

Books.Author: O'Brien, Tim
Books.Title: MSXML3: A Comprehensive Guide
Books.Description:
The Microsoft MSXML3 parser is covered in 
      detail, with attention to XML DOM interfaces, XSLT processing, 
      SAX and more.

Books.Author: Galos, Mike
Books.Title: Visual Studio 7: A Comprehensive Guide
Books.Description:
Microsoft Visual Studio 7 is explored in depth,
      looking at how Visual Basic, Visual C++, C#, and ASP+ are 
      integrated into a comprehensive development 
      environment.
